articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: "Virat Kohli Was Asked Questions...": Australia Great's Warning Ahead Of WTC Final - NDTV Sports
articles.description: In 24 Tests against Australia, Virat Kohli has scored 1,979 runs at an average of 48.26, with eight tons and five fifties. His best score is 186.
articles.content: The World Test Championship final between India and Australia is just around the corner and both the teams are ready to face each other in the ultimate battle of the longest format. The Rohit Sharma-… [+2211 chars]
